articles.description: Duke freshman Marvin Bagley III will miss his second straight game due to a mild right knee sprain.
articles.headline: Bagley ruled out against Virginia Tech

images.caption: Duke freshman Marvin Bagley III will miss his second straight game due to a mild right knee sprain.
images.name: Bagley ruled out against Virginia Tech

articles.description: Auburn head coach Bruce Pearl joins The Paul Finebaum Show to discuss why facing UK is a great opportunity and give an update on the status of Bryce Brown.
articles.headline: Pearl: Tigers 'still hunting' despite recent success

images.caption: Auburn head coach Bruce Pearl joins The Paul Finebaum Show to discuss why facing UK is a great opportunity and give an update on the status of Bryce Brown.
images.name: Pearl: Tigers 'still hunting' despite recent success

articles.description: Attorneys for former Adidas executives James Gatto and Merl Code and former sports agent Christian Dawkins are expected to argue in court Thursday that what their clients are accused of doing doesn't constitute a federal crime.
articles.headline: Ex-Adidas execs, agent want federal charges dropped in corruption case

articles.description: Marvin Bagley III, the ACC's leading scorer and rebounder, will miss Duke's game against Virginia Tech on Wednesday night due to a mild right knee sprain.
articles.headline: Knee will sideline Duke's Marvin Bagley III for second straight game

images.caption: Duke freshman Marvin Bagley III will miss his second straight game due to a mild right knee sprain.
images.name: Bagley ruled out against Virginia Tech

articles.description: Stephen A. Smith recognizes the potential in Oklahoma's Trae Young but says the freshman's small stature leaves him vulnerable at the professional level.
articles.headline: Stephen A. not buying hype for Trae Young

images.caption: Stephen A. Smith recognizes the potential in Oklahoma's Trae Young but says the freshman's small stature leaves him vulnerable at the professional level.
images.name: Stephen A. not buying hype for Trae Young

articles.description: Andy Kennedy is stepping down from Ole Miss at the end of this season. Where should the program turn for its next coach? We have several possibilities.
articles.headline: With Andy Kennedy leaving, whom should the Rebels go after?

images.caption: Andy Kennedy will leave Ole Miss  as the winningest coach in school history.
images.name: Kennedy_Andy 150505 [608x342] - Copy

videos.description: Quentin Snider lobs a pass to Ray Spalding for an alley-oop dunk.
videos.headline: Louisville's Spalding rises for alley-oop

videos.description: Devon Hall delivers a bounce pass to Kyle Guy on the break for a layup.
videos.headline: Virginia's defense leads to easy bucket

videos.description: Ty Jerome feeds a cutting Mamadi Diakite for a two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Virginia's Diakite throws down two-handed slam

videos.description: Ty Jerome drives in the middle of Louisville's defense for a bucket and the foul.
videos.headline: Virginia's Jerome gets into the paint for and-1

videos.description: Dwayne Sutton swipes the ball and breaks free for a dunk in transition.
videos.headline: Louisville's Sutton beats everyone for dunk

videos.description: Kyle Guy gets into the paint and escapes two defenders for a bucket.
videos.headline: Guy loses footing, still scores

videos.description: Anas Mahmoud delivers a dime inside to Ray Spalding for a two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Louisville's Spalding gets position for dunk

videos.description: Ryan McMahon shows off his range and drains a long 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Louisville's McMahon drills deep 3-pointer

videos.description: Ty Jerome shakes his defender and knocks down a 3-pointer as the shot clock is widening down.
videos.headline: Jerome drains 3-pointer before the buzzer

videos.description: Ty Jerome loses his defender and hits a 3-pointer for the Cavaliers.
videos.headline: Jerome buries the dagger

videos.description: Ty Jerome's sits down with Dick Vitale and discusses the dynamic between him and Kyle Guy, which is a key part of Virginia's offense.
videos.headline: Jerome's big shots lift the UVa past Louisville
